admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Irrigation and Rehabilitation
            Project will consist of rehabilitation and improvement of
            the Djatiluhur irrigation system, as well as studies
            relating to extension of the system and optimum use of the
            reservoir, and detailed engineering for a third irrigation
            rehabilitation project.
